statements: UPDATE successful_authentications SET username='john.doe', authentication_method='password' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE successful_authentications SET authentication_time = NOW(), authentication_method = 'Password' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE successful_authentications SET username = 'John Doe', authentication_method = 'Biometric' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE authentication_attempts SET success = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE authentication_logs SET action = 'Login Attempt' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE authentication_attempts SET success = FALSE WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE authentication_logs SET action = 'Login Failed' WHERE user_id = 456 AND timestamp <= '2022-02-28'
UPDATE authenticated_users SET username = 'john.doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE authentication_logs SET login_status = 'Successful' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE authenticated_users SET username='new_username1', password_hash='new_password1' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE authentication_logs SET login_time=NOW(), login_status='SUCCESS' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE successful_auth_attempts SET successful_login_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE username = 'alice';
UPDATE failed_auth_attempts SET failed_login_time = '2022-02-01 09:30:00', username = 'bob' WHERE id = 5;
